title: `format` must match declared `type`
description: `format` applies only to string instances. Using it with another `type` is invalid.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: format on non-string type
comprehensiveExamples.description: `format` only applies to strings; using it on integer is invalid.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: format with mixed non-string types
comprehensiveExamples.description: If `format` is present, ensure `type` is or includes `string`.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: String union with format
comprehensiveExamples.description: It is fine to allow string among other types as long as format targets the string branch.
